dialogue: Why did you say we don't have a budget for our project?
Then why did you say the project isn't feasible?
I never said anything like that.
But you did say you thought it would take ten years to finish?
I've never said anything like that.
Hahaha! You're in total meltdown mode now.
I already forgot what we were talking about.
How was your talk with Dilbert?
He's back-pedaling after I totally owned him.
